title: ricaltman
author: ricaltman
content: Anyone have anything good or bad to say about this website? Legit? Scam?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: I can see investment packages of $300 to $10000. Offering to mine for you? Offering to exchange your coins for you? Offering any other service? Just know that you are going to be scammed if you go for any investment plan on the site.I wanted to know about their reward, but the site wanted me to login, lazy to create email for that now because I can not use my email (for obvious reason of phishing). I wish to know about their profit. But I can not do that now. But definitely know that it is a scam. If you want to mine, it is not easy. You have to calculate the electricity the miners you want to use will consume over certain period of time, buying the miner, other mining equipments and joining a mining pool. If you can not mine yourself, do not mine, do not join any cloud mining site.Avoid.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on October 03, 2022, 12:08:04 PM But definitely know that it is a scam. You are right, I will always consider cloud mining sites to be scams. We have seen quite a number of people being fooled by cloud mining sites.it's like double the money. when you deposit some money, it will be doubled by the site. but if we send money, then we will be deceived.OP, if you are interested in mining. You can look it up in the mining thread on the forums. I think you will get more complete information.the information from @Charles-Tim is also great. You can consider it before you get interested in mining.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: If you talk about Worldexpertminer.com I see the site is engaged in and offers crypto information, services, exchanges and so on, I try to see some reviews, of course I refer to the one below.QuoteThis Worldexpertminer.com site appears to be hosted by a company with a bad reputation. Side effects of accessing websites hosted by such companies can include dealing with sluggish pages, there is no reliability as the website can be deleted at any time, any data insecurity you share on such platforms and so on.Therefore, we recommend that you only interact with websites hosted by trusted companies to ensure the best online experience and the security of your data.Considering the site Worldexpertminer.com, relatively new, I think you should consider carefully if you use the site, maybe there are many other crypto service sites and those that have been operating for a long time with a good reputation that you can use on this forum, rather than new ones whose reputation is not clear.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: This is a scam. Just look at the review section of the landing page. Most definitely a scam trying to take your money.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: In their About Us page they clain they have been in this business since 2000 while their domain name was registered only a year ago!They also claim they are a registered company but they do not provide the registration number or how to verify its validity!The reviews look fake!Googling their address doesn't return any relevant result!...Stay away from them and don't send them any money.

comments.author: ricaltman
comments.body: Quote from: ricaltman on October 03, 2022, 11:56:27 AMAnyone have anything good or bad to say about this website? Legit? Scam?Thanks to all who chipped in with advice. My sister is in the middle of this scam as we speak, 30K so far.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: ricaltman on October 03, 2022, 11:56:27 AMAnyone have anything good or bad to say about this website? Legit? Scam?Oh God, where is the website you are talking about. This one is a real newbie. Mate you would have dropped the website like https://www.worldexpertminer.com/home here for easy access, instead of using it only on the title of the thread. Now we have to go to google to search for it before coming back to make comprehensive comment. The way I look at that site, it is a platform of third hands traders, whereby you sign up and deposit bitcoin and the developers of the forum would used it to trade for you. And at that process anything can happened. Might not able to withdraw your funds or the website would be under maintenance until your funds are diverted. Therefore, if I am the one that will recommend a platform for you to trade I will say use Binance or Remitano these are open source platforms for trading.

Scam?Oh God, where is the website you are talking about. This is a classic that my sister fell for initially about 10 days ago. Initially they said she could invest $2,000, but the next day, they wanted more saying she had already profited 4k and they want another $1200  and she had to do this or she might lose everything. comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: ricaltman on October 03, 2022, 08:27:17 PMQuote from: ricaltman on October 03, 2022, 11:56:27 AMAnyone have anything good or bad to say about this website? Legit? Scam?Thanks to all who chipped in with advice. My sister is in the middle of this scam as we speak, 30K so far.Wasn't it important to check this website before sending such a large amount of funds? There is no way out of the mistake your sister has already made, because the scammers will never return the funds. Every day I see various tempting offers online, and I also know that there are scam motives behind these offers. This is a big lesson for you and your sister to avoid falling victim to such scams in the future.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Sorry to hear that story from your sister ricaltman. As I'm browsing the website, it doesn't really look legitimate at all. After reading a few things under the "Advantages you stand to gain". This is where the false promises starts like the one that they've mentioned about the following:Secured investmentExpert managementThe worst part of the list:Best Investment Plan and prices of the plansYou don't listen to a stranger about giving you investment websites because most of them are likely a scam. If it's all about money, you don't trust a random person that you've just met online because the chances of them sucking your money through these schemes that are likely scams is very high.
